messages.welcome__message: Welcome to LIA, our platform for assessing reading proficiency in Portuguese.
messages.welcome__message_saber: Welcome to Le.ia, your artificial intelligence platform for assessing reading and pronunciation in Portuguese.
messages.lia_message: LIA is an initiative of the State Department of Education of Paran√°, aimed at providing real-time fluency levels of students in the municipal education network.
messages.saber_message: Le.ia is a tool designed to assess and provide results on students' reading and pronunciation levels, informing which fluency level they are categorized in.

profiles.profile__type: Your user has a profile of

permissions.view_permissions: You can perform the following actions on our platform:
permissions.permission__user_groups: Check which groups are associated with your user.
permissions.permission__studants_groups: Check the students who are linked to these groups.
permissions.permission__analyze_performance: Analyze the performance of your students.
permissions.permission__actions: Perform the viewing, editing, creating, or deleting of the following platform resources: Schools, Groups, Users, Exams.
permissions.permission__reports: Access reports and view the results of all students on the platform.

descriptions.group: Administer exams and view results for your students.
